activities: CFI Group performs customer and employees satisfaction surveys.  The data is collected within the EU and processed by our US facility.  Generally, we don't collect any personal information but it is possible that an individual's name or e-mail address may be gathered during the surveying process.
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer client personal information or employee information
recoursemech: CFI Group has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the U.S.-EU Safe Harbor Privacy Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by CFI Group, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
